description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Kingdom of the Yellow Robe: being sketches of the domestic and religious rites and ceremonies of the Siamese ... With illustrations by E. A. Norbury" Author: YOUNG, Ernest - F.R.G.S Contributor: NORBURY, Edwin A. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010055.f.6." Page: 248 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1898 Publisher: A. Constable & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 004001363 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
